full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DUL BA'I SDE SNOD MTHA' DAG GI DGONGS PA PHYIN CI MA LOG PAR 'GREL BAR BYED PA'I LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG NOR BU'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @295B CES 'DUL BA'I SDE SNOD MTHA' DAG GI DGONGS PA PHYIN CI MA LOG PAR 'GREL BAR BYED PA'I LEGS BSHAD SKAL BZANG NOR BU'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BDE LEGS NYI MAS SER THEG CHEN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, SKU GSUM BDAG NYID RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS DANG, ,THEG GSUM SPANGS RTOGS ZHI GYUR DAM PA'I CHOS, ,BSLAB GSUM RGYAN LDAN RIG GROL DGE 'DUN TE, ,MCHOG GSUM RIN CHEN DAM PAS SHIS PA STZOL, ,THUB DBANG THUGS KYI CHU GTER LAS 'ONGS PA'I, ,NYES LTUNG DRI MA DAG BYED GANG G'A'I RGYUN, ,LUS CAN PHAN BDE ZHING SAR LEGS DRANGS NAS, ,BSHAD SGRUB NYI MAS SKYONG MDZAD GANG DER ? LAB GCIG MKHYEN PA'I GTER CHEN GYIS, ,MTHON MTHING RAL BA'I ZUR PHUD LNGA DOR TE, ,NGUR SMRIG GAR GYIS RNAM ROL SHING GI RTZE, ,CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU ? @296A *, ,NAD DON RIG PA'I LUS STOBS YONGS RDZOGS SHING, ,THA SNYAD RIG PA'I MCHE SDER RAB GA-YO BA, ,THUB BSTAN GANGS RI'I SPO LA GNAS 'CHA' BA'I, ,BSHES GNYEN GDONG LNGA'I DBANG PO GANG DE YIS, ,DAD PAS MTHUN RKYEN RLABS CHEN SBYAR BA LAS, ,RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DANG, ,DGE SLONG CHOS 'PHEL DAR RGYAS RNAM GNYIS KYIS, ,BKOD KHYAB LHUR LEN BGYIS TE PAR BSKRUN SKABS, ,GZHUNG LUGS SMRA BA SHES RAB GONG 'PHEL DANG, ,SMRA BA'I KHYU MCHOG BZANG PO 'PHRIN LAS DANG, ,DAD BRTZON LDAN PHA NGAG DBANG BLO GSAL TE, ,DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS KYIS ZHUS DAG MDZAD, ,DE YI MTHU LAS MI MJENG ZHING GI MGON, ,RNAM 'DREN BUR MA SHING PA'I LUNG RTOGS KYI, ,BSTAN PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR TZONG KHA PA'I, ,ZHVA SER RING LUGS DAR ZHING RGYAS GYUR CIG ,RTAG TU NYER ZHI ZHI DUL DRAN LDAN PA'I, ,BLANG DOR LA MTHUN MU SHUN PA'I GROGS BSTEN NAS, ,BZO YIG MI 'TSE 'TSE BA RNAM DAG GIS, ,KHRIMS LAS MI NYAMS NYAMS RTOGS 'PHEL BAR SHOG ,MA BTZAL TSE 'DI'I LTO GOS RNYED TZAN GYIS, ,MTSIM MNGON MTHO NGES LEGS THOB PA'I RGYU, ,MA SMAD TSUL KHRIMS THEM SKAS LA 'JOGS NAS, ,MA NOR LAM BZANG MCHOG LA REG PAR SHOG ,LEGS SBYANG GTZANG MA'I GANG G'A'I RGYUN BZANG PO, ,GNAS SKABS MNGON MTHO RLABS PHRENG RAB GA-YO ZHING, ,MI SHES RMONGS PA'I RNYOG CHU'I RGYUN BCAD DE, ,MTHAR THUG BYANG CHEN RGYA MTSOR 'JUG PAR SHOG ,CES BSHES GNYEN DAM PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BYAMS PA 'OD LDAN GYIS PAR DU BSGRUBS PA' SMON TSIG TU DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I BLO GROS KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,
